message.entry: Input image {0} must be a 2-D or 3-D image.
Input image {0} must be a grayscale or RGB image.
The dimensions of ROI mask must match the dimensions of the label matrix.
Input image of type int16 must be of size MxN.
The specified Connectivity, {0}, is not valid. For 2-D images, Connectivity must be specified as 4 or 8.
The specified Connectivity, {0}, is not valid. For 3-D images, Connectivity must be specified as 6, 18, or 26.
Size of arrays {0} and {1} should be the same.
The foreground and background masks must both contain non-zero elements.
The dimensions of the foreground and background masks must match the dimensions of the label matrix.
Invalid label matrix. Foreground and background markings must correspond to nonzero regions in the label matrix.
Linear indices cannot exceed the number of elements in the label matrix.
